name: Main 1
desc: Save The Town from Rats I
beforeTalk: The Village South East of here is overrun
Rats have swarmed in plague proportions
Kill 10 of them so we can enter the Village

name: Main 2
desc: Save The Town from Snakes II
beforeTalk: Snakes have been attracted by the Rats
Now we need them cleared too
Kill 10 of them so we can enter our Houses

name: Main 3
desc: Clear the Goblin & Orc Camps I
beforeTalk: We can finally enter our Houses.
We have a looming threat right on our doorstep
Preparing to invade the Village.
We need you to kill 10 Goblin Scouts!

name: Main 4
desc: Clear the Goblin & Orc Camps II
beforeTalk: We have removed the scouts trying to gather intelligence
We need to strike there Camp and prevent the invasion.
We need you to kill 10 Orcs at the centre of the Camp!

name: Main 5
beforeTalk: We made a mess of the Camps they will take a while to re-group.
We have reports that Evil Wizards are resurrecting the dead.
We need you to kill 10 Skeletons and put them to rest!

name: Main 6
beforeTalk: There is less Skeletons roaming the Graveyard.
Lets teach those evil wizards a lesson they will never forget
We need you to kill 10 Wizards at the Graveyard!

name: Main 7
desc: Raid the Ogres Tribal Meet I
beforeTalk: They are amassing a tribal party and we need to do something
We need you to kill 20 Ogres at there mass outskirts!

name: Main 8
desc: Raid the Ogres Tribal Meet II
beforeTalk: Great job at launching an invasion of the Tribal Meet
The time has come for us to make a stand and disperse them.
We need you to kill 20 Old Ogres at there Tribal Meet!
